20101211210941.000|20101211210941.526|CCO|        
20101211210941.526|20101211210942.053|CCO|        and sign up now.
20101211210942.053|20101211210942.579|CCO|        
20101211210942.579|20101211210943.105|CCO|            ( announcer )
20101211210943.105|20101211210943.632|CCO|    
20101211210943.632|20101211210944.158|CCO|    Don't take BONIVA if you
20101211210944.158|20101211210944.684|CCO|
20101211210944.684|20101211210945.211|CCO|    problems with your esophagus,
20101211210945.211|20101211210945.737|CCO|    
20101211210945.737|20101211210946.263|CCO|          low blood calcium,
20101211210946.263|20101211210946.789|CCO|    
20101211210946.789|20101211210947.316|CCO|      severe kidney disease,
20101211210947.316|20101211210947.842|CCO|    
20101211210947.842|20101211210948.368|CCO|        or can't sit or stand
20101211210948.368|20101211210948.895|CCO|    
20101211210948.895|20101211210949.421|CCO|      for at least one hour.
20101211210949.421|20101211210949.947|CCO|      Follow dosing instructions
20101211210949.947|20101211210950.474|CCO|        
20101211210950.474|20101211210951.000|CCO|              carefully.
20101211210951.000|20101211210951.667|CCO|    
20101211210951.667|20101211210952.333|CCO|          Stop taking BONIVA
20101211210952.333|20101211210953.000|CCO|
20101211210953.000|20101211210953.667|CCO|and tell your doctor if you have
20101211210953.667|20101211210954.333|CCO|difficult or painful swallowing,
20101211210954.333|20101211210955.000|CCO|        
20101211210955.000|20101211210955.667|CCO|              chest pain
20101211210955.667|20101211210956.333|CCO|            
20101211210956.333|20101211210957.000|CCO|            or severe
20101211210957.000|20101211210957.667|CCO|    
20101211210957.667|20101211210958.333|CCO|    or continuing heartburn,
20101211210958.333|20101211210959.000|CCO|as these may be signs of serious
20101211210959.000|20101211210959.667|CCO|    
20101211210959.667|20101211211000.333|CCO|    upper digestive problems.
20101211211000.333|20101211211001.000|CCO|  If jaw problems or severe bone,
20101211211001.000|20101211211001.588|CCO|    
20101211211001.588|20101211211002.176|CCO|    joint, and/or muscle pain
20101211211002.176|20101211211002.765|CCO|
